Articles.Content:
I find it annoying that while all the other aspects of the UI are disabled with f2 the green glow surrounding parts which are being hovered over with the mouse cursor remains. It's only a minor change and serves no purpose when the menus are not accessible. There isn't much more I can say on it, sorry.

Example of what I mean.
Honestly, I want part glow disabled nearly all the time. Flying a rocket and having parts glow because I mouse over them has always been annoying to me.
I would like it to be disabled with f2. It can ruin a screenshot especially if you have a brief moment of opportunity to catch a rising planet over the horizon
Agreed. The UI is never visible in this mode, so glow is useless there.

To be fair, if you dont like the glow, dont mouse over it when you have the UI shut off. It really is that simple. Barring that, why not just edit the code to make it do what your asking? or make a mod for it? It personally does not bother me at all when I shut the UI down. I just shove my pointer off screen for pics like that any way lol. just sayin
Yes please! I hate the green glow, especially when making videos. Its really immersion braking when you set up and record a good Kerbcam path and then some parts just start lighting up .
Good suggestion! Could someone pop this on our tracker?
Yes Yes Yes!!!!!!! This needs to happen!
